Hi, I'm Kyle.

I'm a software engineer who likes tinkering with things. I mess with web technologies and occassionally a bit of game dev. Currently, I work as a full stack web developer building an ecosystem of APIs and web applications using technologies like .NET Core, NextJS, React, and Typescript.


Going into 2023, I'm trying to focus on branching out into other domains of software than what I'm used to, like systems programming and embeded software. In that vein, I've been perusing and toying with the lower level languages such as C, C++, Rust, etc.
